description:
ARMAF Club de Nuit Intense Man EDT & Limited Edition - A Legendary Masculine Fragrance

Experience the captivating allure of ARMAF Club de Nuit Intense Man, a sophisticated fragrance that has earned its reputation as one of the most sought-after best-selling men's fragrances in the world. This exceptional 105 ML bottle combines power and elegance in a scent that commands attention. âœ¨

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
105 ML Men Eau de Toilette EDT ARMAF

The Signature Club de Nuit Fragrance Profile

This limited edition masterpiece opens with vibrant citrus notes that evolve into a complex heart, finally settling into a rich, woody base that lingers for hours. Perfect for the confident man who appreciates refined woody fragrances with exceptional longevity. ðŸ”¥

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Pineapple, Bergamot, Black Currant, Apple Birch, Jasmine, Rose Musk, Ambergris, Patchouli, Vanilla

Key Features of ARMAF Club de Nuit Intense Man

  • Exceptional longevity (8+ hours) and strong sillage ðŸ’Ž
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for day and evening wear
  • Luxurious oriental-inspired composition
  • Sophisticated black bottle with gold accents
  • Perfect for special occasions and daily use
  • Incredible value compared to similar premium fragrances

The Legacy Behind the Fragrance

ARMAF, established in 2015, has quickly risen to prominence in the fragrance world for creating exceptional scents at accessible price points. Club de Nuit Intense Man has become their signature creation, beloved for its complex composition and remarkable similarity to much more expensive luxury fragrances. This new arrival limited edition offers the same beloved scent in an exclusive presentation. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

Q: How does ARMAF Club de Nuit Intense Man compare to Creed Aventus?

A: While Club de Nuit Intense Man is often compared to Creed Aventus due to similar note profiles, it has developed its own dedicated following. Many enthusiasts appreciate its stronger projection, exceptional longevity (often 8+ hours), and remarkable value. The pineapple and smoky notes are prominent in both, but CDNIM features a slightly more pronounced woody character in the dry down. It's widely regarded as one of the most successful pineapple-accented fragrances available today. ðŸ’«
